org.turbogwt.net.http.serialization

Class JsonValueSerdes<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.turbogwt.net.http.serialization.JsonSerdes<T>
      • org.turbogwt.net.http.serialization.JsonValueSerdes<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the object to serialize/deserialize
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deserializer<T>, Serdes<T>, Serializer<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonBooleanSerdes, JsonNumberSerdes, JsonStringSerdes

    public abstract class JsonValueSerdes<T>
extends JsonSerdes<T>
    Base class for all SerDes that manipulates serialized JSON simple values.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

        Deserialize the plain text into an object of type T.
        Parameters:
        collectionType - The class of the collection
